posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I am think of a strength monk. The build I am considering is Barbarian / Monk / Dwarven Defender

Thoughts??

David

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: You have alignment problems with that build. Both Monk and DD must be Lawful, but Barbarian must not be Lawful.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: I can change alignment on my server.
